messages.message: I just merged the PR. Going to redeploy CPS in crafting-cyp!

ahhh, failed again... <!subteam^S02FJA6A7U5>
So I tried to redeploy only CPS, it succeeded but I forgot to also deploy observability-agent according to @William Helmrathâ€™s msg so we stuck with ss1 :sweat_smile: https://instabase.slack.com/archives/CSY11CK7T/p1747941844919389?thread_ts=1747938427.500529&cid=CSY11CK7T

I tried again to redeploy both CPS and observability-agent and now failed with
```12:48:39  error: deployment "deployment-core-platform-service" exceeded its progress deadline```
https://crafting-cyp.test.instabase.com/deployment-manager/dashboard/deployments/apps/v1/core-platform-service
Could we edit the deployment in k8s to just use the same obs-agent image as other services for now to resolve the issue?
can we just rebuild the whole thing now?
Yea sure... I was trying to save time so that we don't block Cypress CI...
patched the deployment - should be running now
also kicked off a rebuild to clean it up
Cypress ICC sandbox is updated. CI should be back online!
